item.title: Add custom text to Citrix Gateway Login Page RfWebUI
item.description: Before using nFactor it was easy to add some footer with Informations and Warnings using Rewrite Policy or editing the index.html/tmindex.html to Citrix Gateway or an Authentication vserver. As soon as we are applying an AuthenticationProfile to a Citrix vserver or using Advanced Authentication Policies for an Authentication vserver this does not work anymore. Now this can be achived by creating a custom portal theme and a custom login schema.

item.title: Find User that has logged in to a specific Citrix Gateway
item.description: Today I wanted to turn off a specific Citrix Gateway on Netscaler cause I thought it would not be needed anymore. On the first view there were still a lot of users connected to the vpn vserver so simply turning it off would through them all out and was therefore not an option. On the first sight the GUI you can see how many users are connected. But when looking on ICA Connections/DTLS ICA Connections/Active Sessions you see the Backend Server the Client is connected to or the Intranet IP and Application.
